instruction: Rate the following restaurant for cleanliness.
input:
Mela's Diner
Located on Main Street
output: The cleanliness of Mela's Diner on Main Street was excellent.  There was no visible dust or dirt and all furniture, utensils and surfaces were sparkling clean. The bathrooms were also in good condition and smelled fresh. The staff were all friendly and welcoming and the overall atmosphere was pleasant and inviting. All in all, Mela's Diner deserves a top rating for its cleanliness.
